thread.title: BRIEF-Synthesis Electronic Technology to invest 4.9 mln yuan to set up Jinan-based tech company with partner

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Synthesis Electronic Technology to invest 4.9 mln yuan to set up Jinan-based tech company with partner

organizations.name: reuters) - synthesis electronic technology co ltd

text:
Jan 18(Reuters) - Synthesis Electronic Technology Co Ltd :
* Says it will invest 4.9 million yuan to set up a Jinan-based tech company with partner
* Says it will hold 49 percent stake in the target company
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/xYjfgm
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
